description: Name of the identification scheme, in a coded form as published in an external list. 1. "XYZ.OBF.IBAN" is specified as the SchemeName in the Account Identification Section (either DebtorAccount or CreditorAccount). 2. “XYZ.OBF.PAN” is specified as the SchemeName in the Account Identification Section (either DebtorAccount or CreditorAccount). 3. “XYZ.OBF.BBAN” is specified as the SchemeName in the Account Identification Section (CreditorAccount).
